meanings.definition: Thrombokinases: enzymes that catalyze the conversion of prothrombin to thrombin.
meanings.sent1: The thrombokinases in our body help in the process of blood clotting.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the role of thrombokinases in the formation of blood clots.
meanings.sent3: The little thrombokinases in the blood were having a party, turning prothrombin into thrombin.
meanings.sent4: The thrombokinases worked like tiny keys, unlocking the power of prothrombin.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the thrombokinases as tiny workers diligently transforming prothrombin into thrombin.
